headline: Omdia: Abu Dhabi Media and STARZPLAY Partnership Highlights Growing Broadcaster Collaboration in MENA
summary: LONDON, November 04, 2025--According to Omdia research, broadcasters across the Middle East and North Africa are increasingly rethinking their digital strategies. Many are moving away from standalone OTT platforms and exploring partnerships with established streaming services, a trend highlighted by the newly announced partnership between Abu Dhabi Media (ADM) and STARZPLAY. This deal aligns with the patterns Omdia has been tracking worldwide.

headline: AnnaBella Pâtisserie Expands Production and Renews Disney Licensing to Drive Growth in 2025
summary: Renowned French-Japanese dessert brand AnnaBella Pâtisserie is entering a major growth phase in 2025, following the renewal of its Disney licensing agreement and a new BBC Studios (Bluey) collaboration, alongside the acquisition of an additional 4,000 sq ft facility, bringing the total manufacturing space to 16,000 sq ft in Singapore. These strategic milestones position the company to meet rising regional and international demand while expanding its portfolio of premium, character-themed dessert

headline: FUBO Q3 Deep Dive: Disney Hulu+ Live TV Merger Marks New Strategic Phase
summary: Live sports and TV streaming service fuboTV (NYSE:FUBO) reported Q3 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 2.3% year on year to $377.2 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.02 per share was significantly above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To fuboTV (FUBO) and Disney’s Merger Creating a Top Pay TV Provider
summary: On October 29, 2025, FuboTV Inc. and The Walt Disney Company completed a combination of FuboTV's operations with Disney's Hulu + Live TV, creating the sixth-largest Pay TV provider in the U.S. with nearly 6 million subscribers and Disney holding a 70% stake in the new entity. This merger introduces experienced leadership from both companies and positions the combined business to offer both FuboTV and Hulu + Live TV as separate services targeting diverse streaming audiences. We will examine...
